mapper.sql: TA_SP_INSTANCE.instance_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.instance_code , TA_SP_INSTANCE.approve_code , TA_SP_INSTANCE.instance_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.instance_py , TA_SP_INSTANCE.accept_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.accept_time , TA_SP_INSTANCE.end_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.end_time , TA_SP_INSTANCE.time_use , TA_SP_INSTANCE.apply_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.apply_type , TA_SP_INSTANCE.apply_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.org_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.area_code , TA_SP_INSTANCE.project_state , TA_SP_INSTANCE.queue_code , TA_SP_INSTANCE.query_code , TA_SP_INSTANCE.notaccept_reason , TA_SP_INSTANCE.correction_time , TA_SP_INSTANCE.approve_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.instance_source , TA_SP_INSTANCE.submit_time , TA_SP_INSTANCE.remark , TA_SP_INSTANCE.pre_reason , TA_SP_INSTANCE.approve_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.accept_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.end_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.org_name , TA_SP_INSTANCE.cur_tache , TA_SP_INSTANCE.is_sendresult , TA_SP_INSTANCE.rz_apply_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.process_instanceid , TA_SP_INSTANCE.process_definitionid , TA_SP_INSTANCE.is_wlts , TA_SP_INSTANCE.transactor_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.is_exchange , TA_SP_INSTANCE.accept_org_id , TA_SP_INSTANCE.is_need_supervise , TA_SP_INSTANCE.last_supervise , TA_SP_INSTANCE.is_need_supervise2 , TA_SP_INSTANCE.last_supervise2 , TA_SP_INSTANCE.pretrial_time
mapper.update:
update TA_SP_INSTANCE
instance_code=#{instanceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_code=#{approveCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instance_name=#{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instance_py=#{instancePy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_name=#{acceptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_time=#{acceptTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_name=#{endName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time=#{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, time_use=#{timeUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, apply_id=#{applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_type=#{applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_name=#{applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id=#{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code=#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_state=#{projectState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, queue_code=#{queueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, query_code=#{queryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notaccept_reason=#{notacceptReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
correction_time=#{correctionTime,jdbcType=DATE}, approve_id=#{approveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instance_source=#{instanceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time=#{submitTime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_reason=#{preReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_name=#{approveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_id=#{acceptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_id=#{endId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name=#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cur_tache=#{curTache,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_sendresult=#{isSendresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rz_apply_id=#{rzApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instanceid=#{processInstanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
process_definitionid=#{processDefinitionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_wlts=#{isWlts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transactor_id=#{transactorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_exchange=#{isExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_org_id=#{acceptOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_need_supervise=#{isNeedSupervise,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_supervise=#{lastSupervise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_need_supervise2=#{isNeedSupervise2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_supervise2=#{lastSupervise2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pretrial_time=#{pretrialTime,jdbcType=DATE}
and instance_id = #{instanceId} and instance_id =

update TA_SP_INSTANCE
instance_code = null, approve_code = null, instance_name = null, instance_py = null, accept_name = null, accept_time = null, end_name = null, end_time = null, time_use = null, apply_id = null, apply_type = null, apply_name = null, org_id = null, area_code = null, project_state = null, queue_code = null, query_code = null, notaccept_reason = null, correction_time = null, approve_id = null, instance_source = null, submit_time = null, remark = null, pre_reason = null, approve_name = null, accept_id = null, end_id = null, org_name = null, cur_tache = null, is_sendresult = null, rz_apply_id = null, process_instanceid = null, process_definitionid = null, is_wlts = null, transactor_id = null, is_exchange = null, accept_org_id = null, is_need_supervise = null, last_supervise = null, is_need_supervise2 = null, last_supervise2 = null, is_need_supervise3 = null
and instance_id = #{instanceId} and instance_id =
mapper.delete: delete from TA_SP_INSTANCE where 1=1 and instance_id = #{instanceId}
mapper.insert:
insert into TA_SP_INSTANCE (instance_id,instance_code,approve_code,instance_name,instance_py, accept_name,accept_time,end_name,end_time,time_use,apply_id,apply_type, apply_name,org_id,area_code,project_state,queue_code,query_code,notaccept_reason, correction_time,approve_id,instance_source,submit_time,remark,pre_reason, approve_name,accept_id,end_id,org_name,cur_tache,is_sendresult,rz_apply_id, process_instanceid,process_definitionid,is_wlts,transactor_id,is_exchange, accept_org_id,is_need_supervise,last_supervise,is_need_supervise2,last_supervise2, pretrial_time)
select #{entity.instanceId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.instanceCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.instanceName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.instancePy,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.acceptName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.acceptTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.endName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.endTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.timeUse,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{entity.applyId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyType,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.applyName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.areaCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.projectState,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.queueCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.queryCode,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.notacceptReason,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.correctionTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.approveId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.instanceSource,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.submitTime,jdbcType = DATE}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.preReason,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.approveName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.acceptId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.endId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.orgName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.curTache,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isSendresult,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.rzApplyId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.processInstanceid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.processDefinitionid,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isWlts,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.transactorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isExchange,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.acceptOrgId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isNeedSupervise,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastSupervise,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.isNeedSupervise2,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastSupervise2,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{entity.pretrialTime,jdbcType = DATE} from dual

update.foreach:
update TA_SP_INSTANCE
instance_code= #{entity.instanceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
approve_code= #{entity.approveCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instance_name= #{entity.instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
instance_py= #{entity.instancePy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_name= #{entity.acceptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_time= #{entity.acceptTime,jdbcType=DATE}, end_name= #{entity.endName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time= #{entity.endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, time_use= #{entity.timeUse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, apply_id= #{entity.applyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_type= #{entity.applyType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_name= #{entity.applyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_id= #{entity.orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_code= #{entity.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_state= #{entity.projectState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
queue_code= #{entity.queueCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, query_code= #{entity.queryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notaccept_reason= #{entity.notacceptReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, correction_time= #{entity.correctionTime,jdbcType=DATE},
approve_id= #{entity.approveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instance_source= #{entity.instanceSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submit_time= #{entity.submitTime,jdbcType=DATE}, remark= #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_reason= #{entity.preReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approve_name= #{entity.approveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
accept_id= #{entity.acceptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_id= #{entity.endId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name= #{entity.orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cur_tache= #{entity.curTache,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_sendresult= #{entity.isSendresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rz_apply_id= #{entity.rzApplyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_instanceid= #{entity.processInstanceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, process_definitionid= #{entity.processDefinitionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_wlts= #{entity.isWlts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transactor_id= #{entity.transactorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_exchange= #{entity.isExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, accept_org_id= #{entity.acceptOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_need_supervise= #{entity.isNeedSupervise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_supervise= #{entity.lastSupervise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_need_supervise2= #{entity.isNeedSupervise2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_supervise2= #{entity.lastSupervise2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pretrial_time= #{entity.pretrialTime,jdbcType=DATE}
and instance_id = #{entity.instanceId} and instance_id =

mapper.select: select a.instance_id , a.instance_code , a.instance_name , nvl(b.approve_limit,0) as approve_limit, nvl(b.commitment_limit,0) as commitment_limit from TA_SP_INSTANCE a left join TA_SP_SERVICES_GUIDE b on b.approve_id = a.approve_id where a.instance_id = #{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.instance_id , a.instance_code , a.instance_name , nvl(b.special_timelimit,0) as commitment_limit from TA_SP_INSTANCE a left join ta_sp_suspend b on b.instance_id = a.instance_id where a.instance_id = #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.suspend_id = #{suspendId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.instance_id ,t.accept_time ,t.end_time, (select (a.am_begin_time || '##' ||a.am_end_time||'##'||a.pm_begin_time||'##'||a.pm_end_time) from WF_WORKDATE a where to_date(to_char(t.accept_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_date(a.begin_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(a.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as work_time, (select count(*) from WF_HOLIDAY a where a.holiday between to_char(t.accept_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(case when t.end_time is null then sysdate else t.end_time end,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as holiday_count from TA_SP_INSTANCE t where t.accept_time is not null and t.instance_id in
#{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select p.instance_id,p.submit_time,p.pretrial_time,p.work_time, (select count(*) from WF_HOLIDAY a where a.holiday between to_char(p.submit_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(case when p.pretrial_time is null then sysdate else p.pretrial_time end,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as holiday_count from ( select t.instance_id || '##' || t.approve_id as instance_id,t.submit_time, case when t.correction_time is null then (case when t.pretrial_time is null then t.accept_time else t.pretrial_time end) else t.correction_time end as pretrial_time, (select (a.am_begin_time || '##' ||a.am_end_time||'##'||a.pm_begin_time||'##'||a.pm_end_time) from WF_WORKDATE a where to_date(to_char(t.submit_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_date(a.begin_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(a.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as work_time from TA_SP_INSTANCE t where t.submit_time is not null) p where p.instance_id in
#{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.instance_id || '@@' || a.approve_id as instance_id, a.end_time,b.update_time as pretrial_time, (select (a.am_begin_time || '##' ||a.am_end_time||'##'||a.pm_begin_time||'##'||a.pm_end_time) from WF_WORKDATE a where to_date(to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_date(a.begin_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(a.end_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as work_time, (select count(*) from WF_HOLIDAY a where a.holiday between to_char(a.end_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(case when b.update_time is null then sysdate else b.update_time end,'yyyy-mm-dd')) as holiday_count from TA_SP_INSTANCE a left join v_jc_dzzz b on b.instance_id = a.instance_id where a.instance_id || '@@' || a.approve_id in
#{instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t.instance_id , case when t.correction_time is null then (case when t.pretrial_time is null then t.accept_time else t.pretrial_time end) else t.correction_time end as pretrial_time , t.last_supervise2 from TA_SP_INSTANCE t where t.instance_source = '2' and t.instance_id in
#{instance.instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.instance_id ,b.update_time as pretrial_time ,a.last_supervise3 from TA_SP_INSTANCE a left join v_jc_dzzz b on b.instance_id = a.instance_id where a.instance_id in
#{instance.instanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT TEMP.* FROM ( select ROWNUM RN, t.instance_id, t.accept_time, t.end_time, (select (a.am_begin_time || '##' || a.am_end_time || '##' || a.pm_begin_time || '##' || a.pm_end_time) from wf_workdate a where to_date(to_char(t.accept_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') between to_date(a.begin_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_date(a.end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as work_time, (select count(*) from wf_holiday a where a.holiday between to_char(t.accept_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(case when t.end_time is null then sysdate else t.end_time end, 'yyyy-mm-dd')) as holiday_count, t.completed_time from ta_sp_instance t where t.project_state between '4' and '8' and t.accept_time is not null and t.end_time >= t.accept_time and t.end_time is not null and t.completed_time is null AND ROWNUM <= ${_parameter}) TEMP
mapper.update: update ta_sp_instance a set a.is_need_supervise = 'N' where a.approve_id in (select b.approve_id from V_JC_APPROVE_INFO b where b.trans_type <> '1' and b.is_jc = 'N') and a.accept_time < (select c.lastupdate_time from V_JC_APPROVE_INFO c where c.trans_type <> '1' and c.is_jc = 'N' and c.approve_id = a.approve_id)
update V_JC_APPROVE_INFO a set a.is_jc = 'N' where a.trans_type = '1' and a.is_jc = 'Y'
update V_JC_APPROVE_INFO a set a.is_jc = 'Y' where a.trans_type <> '1' and a.is_jc = 'N'
